Title: Sets reimbursement rates for essential safety net hospitals
Summary: Sets reimbursement rates for essential safety net hospitals at no less than regional average commercial rates for health care services provided by all hospitals in the same geographic region.
LawCode: Amd ยง2807-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to setting reimbursement rates for essential safety net hospitals
